description.en: Topics covered by the course include: requirement definition, requirements engineering framework, system and context boundaries, goal-oriented modelling, scenario analysis, solution-oriented requirements, requirements documentation, requirements elicitation, requirements negotiation, requirements validation (fundamentals, validation techniques, validation using prototyping), requirements management (traceability, prioritisation, and change management).
description.et: Kursusel kaetavad teemad sisaldavad: nõuete määratlemist, nõuete analüüsi raamistikke, süsteemi ja konteksti piire, eesmärksuunatud modelleerimist, stsenaariumi analüüsi, lahendussuunatud nõudeid, nõuete dokumenteerimist, nõuete välja toomist, nõuete läbi rääkimist, nõuete kontrolli (alused, valideerimisvõtted, kontrollimine prototüpeerimise vahendusel), nõuete haldust (jälitatavus, prioriteetide seadmine ja muudatuste haldamine).

objectives.en: This course will provide students an overview of requirements engineering fundamentals, principles and techniques. The course will consider major requirements engineering approaches, as well as their artefacts, like goals, scenarios and solution-oriented requirements. The course will present the major requirements engineering activities, like, requirements documentation, requirements elicitation, requirements negotiation, and requirements management. The course will also consider requirements validation, taking into account different techniques, including validation through prototyping.
objectives.et: Kursus annab tudengitele ülevaate nõuete analüüsi alustest, põhimõtetest ja võtetest. Kursuses vaadeldakse enimlevinud lähenemisi nõuete analüüsile ning nende tehiseid nagu eesmärgid, stsenaariumid ja lahendussuunatud nõuded. Kursus tutvustab suuremaid nõuete analüüsiga seotud tegevusi nagu nõuete dokumenteerimine, nõuete välja toomine, nõuete läbi rääkimine ja nõuete haldamine. Kursus keskendub ka nõuete kontrollimisele võttes arvesse erinevaid võtteid, kaasa arvatud kontroll prototüpeerimise vahendusel.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students will able to:
1. Elicit, negotiate and document software requirements.
learning_outcomes.et: 1) Välja tooma, läbi rääkima ja dokumenteerima tarkvara nõudeid.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Develop major requirements artefacts and use them during the software development projects.
learning_outcomes.et: 2) Looma olulisemaid nõuete tehiseid ning kasutama neid tarkvaraarendusprojektides.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Explain the concepts, theories, and best practices associated with requirements engineering.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) Seletama nõuete analüüsiga seotud mõisteid, teooriaid ja parimaid praktikaid.

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Apply requirements validation techniques within various software development lifecycles with emphasis on the prototyping oriented projects.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) Rakendama nõueteanalüüsi võtteid mitmetes tarkvaraarenduse elutsüklites rõhuga prototüpeerimissuunatud projektidel.

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Manage software requirements, priorities, trace them and control their evolution.
learning_outcomes.et: 5) Haldama tarkvara nõudeid, prioriteete, neid jälitama ja nende arengut kontrollima.

notes.et: The course will consist of 16 lessons, each lesson will include a lecture and a practical work session.

description.et: assignments should be submitted on time and satisfy the requirements

grade_preconditions.et: Assignments to be submitted and evaluated positively

grade_evaluation.et:
There will be two assessment items:
* Assignments (40 points)
* Final exam (60 points)
The resulting grade (out of 100) will be mapped to a grade between A and F using the standard University scale.

debt_elimination.et: A deferred exam will be offered to students who are unable to attend the first exam. Points will be deducted from assignments that are handed in after the announced deadline.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
